summary: Added WezTerm OSC 7 integration to Neovim autocmds.lua. The implementation emits OSC 7 escape sequences on DirChanged, VimEnter, and BufEnter events, guarded by WEZTERM_PANE environment check. Tab titles now update to show Neovim's current working directory.

artifacts.summary: Added WezTerm OSC 7 autocmd block with emit_osc7 helper and three autocmds for directory change, startup, and buffer enter events
Implementation summary with details of changes, verification results, and rollback instructions

completion_data.completion_summary: Added WezTerm OSC 7 integration to Neovim autocmds.lua with DirChanged, VimEnter, and BufEnter autocmds that emit OSC 7 escape sequences to update tab titles to show Neovim's current working directory.

next_steps: Restart Neovim to activate the OSC 7 integration and test tab title updates with :cd commands
